attributes.action: NO to using FUR in the furrrruture
attributes.additional_details:
Say no to killing animals for their fur.
killing animals just for their skin is cruel and should be stopped.When there are so many ways of creating fake fur why not do it?
We create so many other fakes what makes this so different?
Think of it like this, i don't know you or care about you but want your skin for my new bag. so i just kill you! That's whats happening to all of those poor animals. We don't think that they'll become extinct or thnk about their family's or predetor that live off them!!! So next time you go to by that fur coat think again think of thr furrrrrrrrutre!
